topic: How to implement WASM targets using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to implement WASM targets using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Implementing WebAssembly (WASM) Targets with FastAPI using Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to utilize WebAssembly (WASM) targets in conjunction with FastAPI for building high-performance web applications using Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understanding the benefits of using WASM and FastAPI
Integrating the WebAssembly module with the FastAPI application
Testing and deploying the final application
